Package cams.enquiry.enquirer_controller

Class StudentEnquirerController

java.lang.Object
cams.enquiry.enquirer_controller.StudentEnquirerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquirerController, java.io.Serializable
public class StudentEnquirerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnquirerController, java.io.Serializable
Represents an enquirer in the dashboard system, extending the functionality of EnquirerUI. This class provides implementations for submitting, editing, and deleting enquiries related to camps.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • submit

      public boolean submit​(java.lang.String campName, User user, java.lang.String text)
      Submits an enquiry about a specific camp.
      Specified by:
      submit in interface EnquirerController
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to which the enquiry is addressed.
      user - The user making the enquiry.
      text - The content of the enquiry.
      Returns:
      true if the submission is successful, false if the camp does not exist.

    • edit

      public boolean edit​(User user, int postIndex, java.lang.String content)
      Edits an existing enquiry made by a user.
      Specified by:
      edit in interface EnquirerController
      Parameters:
      user - The user who made the enquiry.
      postIndex - The index of the enquiry in the user's list of enquiries.
      content - The new content of the enquiry.
      Returns:
      true if the edit is successful, false if the user does not exist.

    • delete

      public boolean delete​(User user, int postIndex)
      Deletes an enquiry made by a user.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface EnquirerController
      Parameters:
      user - The user who made the enquiry.
      postIndex - The index of the enquiry in the user's list of enquiries.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false if the user does not exist or if the post has replies.

    • view

      public int view​(User user)
      Displays the enquiries of the user and returns the count of those enquiries. Each enquiry is displayed with its index and content.
      Specified by:
      view in interface EnquirerController
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose enquiries are to be displayed.
      Returns:
      The number of enquiries displayed.
